channel.title: Music – Akeboshi
channel.description: Recent content in Akeboshi on Music

item.title: Akeboshi - wind ("NARUTO-ナルト-"ED)
item.description:
작곡: AKEBOSHI / 작사: AKEBOSHI
KY: 44381 / KY: 68007

Cultivate your hunger

before you idealize

Motivate your anger

to make them realize

Climbing the mountain.

Never coming down?

Break into

the contents

Never

falling down

My knee is

still shaking

Like I was twelve

Sneaking out

The class room

by the back door

A man railed

at me twice

But

I didn’t care

Waiting is wasting

for people like me

Don’t try

to live so wise.

Don’t cry

coz you’re so right.

Don’t dry

with fakes or fears.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Don’t try

to live so wise.

Don’t cry

coz you’re so right.

Don’t dry

with fakes or fears.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

You say

“dreams are dreams”

I ain’t gonna play

the fool anymore.

You say “coz I still

got my soul.”

Take your time baby

your blood

Needs to slow down.

“Breach your soul.”

“Reach yourself

before you gloom.”

Reflection

of fear makes

Shadows of nothing,

shadows of nothing.

You still are

blind

If you see

the winding road.

Coz there is always

a straight

Way to the point

you see

Don’t try

to live so wise.

Don’t cry

coz you’re so right.

Don’t dry

with fakes or fears.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Don’t try

to live so wise.

Don’t cry

coz you’re so right.

Don’t dry

with fakes or fears.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Don’t try

to live so wise.

Don’t cry

coz you’re so right.

Don’t dry

with fakes or fears.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.

Coz you will hate

yourself in the end.
